detail_desc: Double-breasted jacket woven in a viscose blend with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Double-breasted jacket woven in a viscose blend with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Top with dropped shoulders, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist and lightly brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Top with dropped shoulders, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist and lightly brushed inside.

Knee-length trenchcoat in a viscose and linen weave with notch lapels, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Detachable ties at the waist, diagonal welt front pockets, and a single back vent. No fasteners. Unlined.
Boxer shorts in soft cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Boxer shorts in soft cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Boxer shorts in soft cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Sleeveless, A-line top in airy chiffon with sequins at the top, an open back and shimmering button at the back of the neck. Inner top in jersey.

Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with pleats. Detachable tie belt at the waist, long raglan sleeves and cuffs with a slit and button. Unlined.
Quilted top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Quilted top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with decorative sequins at the top, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with decorative sequins at the top, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a jacquard-weave cotton blend with a concealed zip at the back and a detachable tie belt with a fabric-covered metal buckle at the waist. Unlined.

Shirt in a jacquard-weave cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, wide dress in a soft viscose weave. Small stand-up collar with gathers to create a gentle drape, buttons at the back and raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Wide, velvet-covered Alice band.

Straight-style shirt in soft pima cotton piqué with a gently tapered waist, button-down collar, French front and open chest pocket. Double-layered yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Straight-style shirt in soft pima cotton piqué with a gently tapered waist, button-down collar, French front and open chest pocket. Double-layered yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Knee-length dress in glittery stretch jersey with a small stand-up collar and a small opening at the back with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Opening at the front and a seam under the bust. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, rib-knit linen with a round neckline in a relaxed fit.

Denim shirt made from a Tencel® lyocell blend with a button-down collar, classic front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Denim shirt made from a Tencel® lyocell blend with a button-down collar, classic front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide panel to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide panel to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1.2 cm to 3.7 cm.

Flared, pleated, knee-length skirt in a rib knit with a sheen. High, elasticated waist.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a welt seam around the soles and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and non-marking soles.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and pair of shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Printed T-shirt with a round neckline and rounded hem. Shorts with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, text print and rounded hems.

Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft and padded top edge. Zip at one side, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Waterproof trainers in mesh with imitation leather details. Padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a contrasting colour grosgrain loop at the back. Reflective details. Linings and moulded insoles in mesh.

Biker jacket in soft imitation suede with a collar, decorative buttons on the lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, zipped side pockets, a small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front and a decorative tab and button at the sides. Satin lining.
